text: Lady Saso () lived in the Jinhan confederacy during the first century BCE. She was also known as Sacred Mother of Mt. Seondo (Hangul:선도산) and she was from a Chinese royal family.,p3,p94 She came from China to Jinhan confederacy and gave birth to Hyeokgeose of Silla and his wife Lady Aryeong. There are specific descriptions about her in the Samguk yusa (Memorabilia of the Three Kingdoms) and the Samguk Sagi (History of the Three Kingdoms). == Outline == The following description is from the Samguk Yusa (Memorabilia of the three Kingdoms), volume 5, clause 7. == Family == == References == Category:Silla people Category:Korean mythology Category:Korean people of Chinese descent Category:Korean royal consorts Category:Korean folk religion Category:Deified Korean people Category:Mountain goddesses
title: Lady Saso
